title: NO Gas Distribution on Wednesday (8)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas urges the people NOT to wait in queues to obtain gas since it will not distribute domestic gas cylinders on Wednesday (8).
Another vessel with a LP gas shipment is scheduled to arrive in the country, Litro said.
Litro further said that it will start distributing gas after the vessel reaches the country.
Meanwhile, there were long queues in many areas on Tuesday (7) as well to purchase gas.

CEB Engineers to go on strike against bill to amend Sri Lanka Electricity Act
